docs.snippet: The Royal Mail steamship Arabia, J. STONE, Esq., Commander, from Liverpool on the 7th inst.. arrived at this port at an early hour yesterday morning. The Arabia, on the afternoon of the 7th, passed the Canada off the Calf of Man.

headline.main: EUROPE; THE QUEEN AT CHERBOURG. Important from India and China. AFFAIRS IN TURKEY AND EGYPT. The Atlantic Telegraph in Great Britain. ARRIVAL OF THE ARABIA. The Collision with the Europa. ADVICES THREE DAYS LATER. ARRIVAL OF THE AGAMEMNON.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Royal Mail steamship Arabia, J. STONE, Esq., Commander, from Liverpool on the 7th inst.. arrived at this port at an early hour yesterday morning. The Arabia, on the afternoon of the 7th, passed the Canada off the Calf of Man.

docs.snippet: Present---the Mayor, President HASWELL and Drs. ROCKWELL, MILLER and THOMPSON. Permission was granted for the cotton which came into port on the empire City to he lightered from Quarantine. Schooner Ann E. Glover allowed to proceed to sail way on...
docs.lead_paragraph: Present---the Mayor, President HASWELL and Drs. ROCKWELL, MILLER and THOMPSON. Permission was granted for the cotton which came into port on the empire City to he lightered from Quarantine. Schooner Ann E. Glover allowed to proceed to sail way on west end of Staten Island on the 25th inst.

docs.snippet: Mr. FIELD'S RESIGNATION -We understand that since Mr. FIELD has sent in his resignation as active Manager of the Atlantic Telegraph Company, a feeling of strong regret has been very generally expressed among the stockholders in this country, and many...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. FIELD'S RESIGNATION -We understand that since Mr. FIELD has sent in his resignation as active Manager of the Atlantic Telegraph Company, a feeling of strong regret has been very generally expressed among the stockholders in this country, and many letters have been addressed to him, begging of him to withdraw his letter.

docs.snippet: By the Arabia we have advices from South America, brought to Southampton by the steamer Aton on the 4th inst. The dates are Buenos Ayres, June 28, Monte Video, June 29, Rio Janeiro, July 10. When the Avon left Rlo the Chambers were still sitting....
docs.lead_paragraph: By the Arabia we have advices from South America, brought to Southampton by the steamer Aton on the 4th inst. The dates are Buenos Ayres, June 28, Monte Video, June 29, Rio Janeiro, July 10. When the Avon left Rlo the Chambers were still sitting. Much satisfaction was felt at the terms of the new loan, The coffee crop was an average one, and of good quality.

headline.main: THE OCEAN TELEGRAPH.; Grand Reception at the House of Cyrus W. Field, Esq. CABLE REJOICINGS. DISPATCHES SENT AND RECEIVED. The Line Reported in Good Working Order.

docs.lead_paragraph: The following dispatches from Trinity Bay and Carbenear were received yesterday morning by CyBUS W. FIELD, Esq: CARBONEAE, Thursday, Aug. 19. The cable is working beautifully to day. I reached Cyrus station this evening. A. MACKAY. TRINITY BAY, Friday, Aug. 19.

headline.main: Starch Manufacturing Near New-York. STORY AND DESCRIPTION OF STARCH, AnD OF ITS USE AND Manufacture

docs.lead_paragraph: HISTORY AND DESCRIPTION OF STARCH, AND OF ITS USE AND MANUFACTURE. Few persons are aware how many manufacturing enterprises are constantly springing up around this metropolis, not only along the adjacent rivers, but on the Long Island coast, where numerous bays and coves furnish facilities for an easy and direct water communication with the city warehouses.

docs.snippet: The Commissioners of Health met as usual on Thursday. The case of the schooner Ralpk Post, from NewOileans, was referred to the Health Officer. The bark Stampede was permitted to come up to the City on the 29th instant. The steamer Atalanta, from...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Commissioners of Health met as usual on Thursday. The case of the schooner Ralpk Post, from NewOileans, was referred to the Health Officer. The bark Stampede was permitted to come up to the City on the 29th instant. The steamer Atalanta, from Charleston, was perinflted to proceed after discharging her cargo, and being cleansed and fumigated.

headline.main: ARRIVAL OF THE FRIGATE NIAGARA; FIREWORKS AND ILLUMINATIONS. Addresses of Capt. Hudson, Cyrus W. Field and Others. Capt. Hudson Received at the Mansion House. GRAND CELEBRATION IN BROOKLYN. GREAT PUBLIC EXCITEMENT. Salutes from the Battery, the Forts and the Shipping.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States steam frigate Niagara, Capt. HUDSON, anchored outside the bar early yesterday morning. and arrived off the Battery at 4:50 P. M. The Niagara, on her way up, was saluted from Fort Hamilton, by vessels in the bay, and, lastly, by 100 guns from the Battery.
